Package src.services

Class Service3

Object
Service3
public class Service3 extends Object
Service 3
This service will monitor a file for changes and notify the client when the file has been modified
The client will specify the file path and the server will monitor the file for changes
When the file has been modified, the server will notify the client
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lee Juin

  • Method Details

    • addRecord

      public static boolean addRecord(int responseID, DatagramPacket request, String filePath, Date expiryDate)
      Subscribe a client to file change
      Parameters:
      responseID - The response ID of the client
      request - The request packet from the client
      filePath - The path to the file
      expiryDate - The expiry date of the subscription
      Returns:
      True if the record is added successfully, false otherwise
